question:
Which of the following statements are correct regarding Kabir?
1. He denounced idolatry and rituals.
2. He laid great emphasis on the equality of man before God.
3. According to him devotion to god is an effective means of salvation.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Kabir denounced all forms of idolatry and rituals. He laid great emphasis on the equality of man before God. According to him devotion to god is an effective means of salvation.
